overview:
Dave is Limboâ€™s Vice President of Corporate Development. At his previous companies, Verizon Wireless and InphoMatch respectively, Dave was a major force in shaping the mobile data industry in the United States. In leading the direct-to-consumer data business at Verizon, Dave drove the content programming team that was responsible for all off-deck content, which included such hits as â€œDeal or No Deal,â€ as well as launched downloadable content, which included ringtones and images. And as the chairman of the Mobile Marketing Associationâ€™s (MMA) Consumer Best Practices Committee, Dave helped pioneer the development of mobile content and off-deck community in the U.S. marketplace. In recognition of his achievements, Dave received the coveted MMA â€œOutstanding Individual Achievement Awardâ€ in 2006. Dave currently serves on the MMA Board of Directors as well as co-chairs its Consumer Best Practices Committee.

Before joining Verizon Wireless, Dave was director of carrier services at InphoMatch, an inter-carrier messaging vendor. He studied computer science at Villanova University and has an MBA and an MIS from the University of Maryland. Additionally, Dave served as an officer in the U.S. Navy, where he flew carrier-based aircraft.
